typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	adf_run_id as string ('')
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		base_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		fuel_out as string,
		fuel_in as string,
		fuel_uplift as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BlobStorage
BlobStorage derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $adf_run_id) ~> AddADFDetails
AddADFDetails sink(input(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as string,
		ESTD_ARRVL as string,
		ESTD_DPTR as string,
		FLT_DT as string,
		FLT_ID as integer,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FLT_ID = flight_id,
		FLT_NUM = flight_number,
		FLT_DT = flight_date,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM = aircraft_registration_number,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE = aircraft_type,
		SCHDD_DPTR = scheduled_departure,
		SCHDD_ARRVL = scheduled_arrival,
		ESTD_DPTR = estimated_departure,
		ESTD_ARRVL = estimated_arrival,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT = actual_oooi_out,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF = actual_oooi_off,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON = actual_oooi_on,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN = actual_oooi_in,
		BASE_AIR_PORT = base_airport,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT = scheduled_departure_airport,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = scheduled_arrival_airport,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT = actual_departure_airport,
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = actual_arrival_airport,
		IS_VERFD = is_verified,
		NOTES = notes,
		IS_CNCLD = is_canceled,
		FLT_TYPE = flight_type,
		CRGO_WGT = cargo_weight,
		FUEL_IN = fuel_in,
		FUEL_OUT = fuel_out,
		FUEL_UPLIFT = fuel_uplift,
		MAINT_LOG_PG = maint_log_page,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
